refnamediv.refpurpose: To check whether the problem was proven to be infeasible.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This post-solution query routine is used to learn whether the problem was proven to be infeasible.
It prints whether or not the problem was proven to be infeasible to scilab console.

refsection.title: Return value
refsection.para: It returns 1 if the problem was solved proven to be infeasible or 0 if it was not proven to be infeasible or -1 if there was an error.
